name: May the last one to leave please turn off the light
name_original: May the last one to leave please turn off the light
description:
A small game made for the Trijam #160

How long was the development time?

Ok, it was a bit more than 3h. It was 5h to be specific. Why? I just had too much fun developing to stop after 3h. Sue me.

What's the goal?

Turn off the lights in all the rooms, and then leave the building. Can't be too difficult now can it?

How to play?

Just move the character with the Arrow Keys or WASD.

Use Left / Right to turn and Up to move forward.
